tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE game_transactions (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id UUID NOT NULL,
    transaction_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    virtual_currency_amount INT NOT NULL,
    purchase_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id UUID NOT NULL,
    transaction_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    transaction_amount NUMERIC NOT NULL,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE purchases (
    purchase_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id UUID NOT NULL,
    purchase_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    purchase_amount NUMERIC NOT NULL,
    purchase_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
	transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	player_id INT,
	transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
	transaction_type VARCHAR(255),
	transaction_amount DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE purchases (
	purchase_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	player_id INT,
	purchase_date TIMESTAMP,
	purchase_item VARCHAR(255),
	purchase_amount DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE player_stats (
	player_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	player_name VARCHAR(255),
	player_level INT,
	player_currency DECIMAL,
	player_total_purchases INT
);

CREATE TABLE player_purchases (
  purchase_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  player_id INT,
  item_id INT,
  purchase_amount INT,
  purchase_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id UUID,
    transaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    amount DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE purchases (
    purchase_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id UUID,
    purchase_date TIMESTAMP,
    purchased_item VARCHAR(100),
    price DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE player_transactions (
    player_transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id UUID,
    transaction_id UUID,
    amount DECIMAL(10,2),
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP
);
